verses.roman:
evaṁ gurubhya etebhya
eṣā me śikṣitā matiḥ
svātmopaśikṣitāṁ buddhiṁ
śṛṇu me vadataḥ prabho

synonyms: evam—thus; gurubhyaḥ—from the spiritual masters; etebhyaḥ—from these; eṣā—this; me—by me; śikṣitā—learned; matiḥ—knowledge; sva-ātma—from one's own body; upaśikṣitām—learned; buddhim—knowledge; śṛṇu—please hear; me—from me; vadataḥ—as I am speaking; prabho—O King.
translation: O King, from all these spiritual masters I have acquired great wisdom. Now please listen as I explain what I learned from my own body.
